extracted_information: The web content identifies several viral TikTok products for 2025, specifically focusing on home and lifestyle categories. These products gain viral appeal due to their utility, convenience, pet-related benefits, or integration into wellness routines, often showcased by influencers demonstrating their effectiveness and real-life application.

features.name: Standing Desk Treadmill
features.viral_appeal: Popular for integrating movement into daily work-from-home routines, inspiring productivity and fitness. Influencers highlight ease of use.

features.name: Portable Humidifier
features.viral_appeal: Embraced by TikTok beauty communities for maintaining skin hydration in dry environments, especially in colder months, due to its ability to maintain moisture levels.

features.name: Portable Cereal Cup
features.viral_appeal: Part of the meal prep trend, valued for its convenience for eating on the go. Viral videos show how it keeps cereal and milk fresh and separate.

features.name: Pet Grooming Gloves
features.viral_appeal: Popular for gentle and effective fur removal while fostering pet bonding. Viral videos feature satisfied pets enjoying the grooming experience.

features.name: Interactive Pet Feeders
features.viral_appeal: A hit with pet owners for engaging pets during mealtime, providing mental stimulation, a fun challenge, and entertainment.

features.name: Cooling Mats for Pets
features.viral_appeal: A viral favorite for pet owners to keep their pets comfortable in the heat, especially during summer months.

features.name: Cat Water Fountains
features.viral_appeal: Considered a must-have by pet owners, encouraging pets to drink more fresh water and promoting better health.

features.name: Pet Hair Remover Rollers
features.viral_appeal: Praised for efficiently maintaining a clean, fur-free home, effective on furniture, clothing, and car seats.

features.name: Acupressure Mats
features.viral_appeal: Part of the self-care trend, designed to relieve stress and tension, often featured in at-home spa experience videos.

geographical_data.global_market: Most market statistics are global in scope.
